But the problem is that many of the PHV car is under rental company. Since it does not belong to the driver  they will anyhow wack and don't bother to clean or maintain the parts

By the time they sell to 2nd hand dealer  usually is damn shit condition
Popular PHV vehicle quite hard to find in 2nd hand market that has not been used as PHV before (vezel  Mazda 3 etc..)
Drivers go for cheapest oem to keep operating cost down
And majority go for recon parts for replacement
